titles.title: Tax Relief for the Unemployed Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the provisions which include unemployment compensation in gross income.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Tax Relief for the Unemployed Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the inclusion in gross income of unemployment compensation.
